title: [Large-Scale] Interactive Learning Program for Strengthening Media Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Program cultivating systematic response capabilities to information influence activities, implementable in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a 3-step evaluative framework for critically analyzing diverse media content.
Learners can identify 5 key signals of misinformation and false claims with 80%+ accuracy.
Learners can execute effective communication strategies to respond to information influence activities in role-play scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
